entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
